explanation: The stage direction 'Le théâtre change et représente le palais du grand sacrificateur de Cybèle' describes a change in the stage setting to represent the palace of the high priest of Cybele. This falls under the category of 'setting', which is defined as 'Stage description or play location.'
stgdir: Le théâtre change et représente le palais du grand sacrificateur de Cybèle.
